items.content_html: A lightweight, mobile-first Progressive Web App built with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. Features include a dynamic product slider, Instagram-style stories, and a fixed bottom navigation for a native-like experience. Designed with performance and smooth UX in mind â€“ no frameworks, just clean modular code and PWA optimization.

Designed with performance and smooth UX in mind â€“ no frameworks, just clean modular code and PWA optimization.

items.content_html: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
